name: The Heat is On
description:
You have forgotten to turn off your nuclear powered oven!  It is overheating and will explode. Your only option is to counter the rising heat with something cold until the inevitable happens.

You have stashed some grenades in your apartment. Break thru walls and open some fridges. Your neighbors won't mind.

Controls:

MoveW/A/S/D
JumpSpaceThrow grenade
Left Mouse Button

Made for Ludum Dare 50 from scratch in 48 hours.
